titles: A summary of material heads which may be enlarged and improved into a compleat answer to Dr. Burnet's Theory of the earth digested into an essay by a pensioner of the Charter-House.
author: Lovell, Archibald.
publisher: Printed by T.B. and are to be sold by the book-sellers of London and Westminster,
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
keywords: Burnet, Thomas, 1635?-1715. --  Telluris theoria sacra. --  English.
